story:
Once upon a time, in a small village nestled among the rolling hills of Tuscany, there lived a young boy named Luca. Luca was a curious and kind-hearted child who loved to explore the forests and fields surrounding his home. Every evening, as the sun dipped below the horizon, Luca's nonno would sit him on his lap and tell him stories of great adventures and magical creatures.

One night, as Luca lay in bed, the moonlight streaming through his window, he heard a soft rustling outside. Curious, he got up and peered out into the night. To his surprise, he saw a small, glowing creature darting among the olive trees. It was a firefly, its tiny light flickering like a star.

Intrigued, Luca followed the firefly as it danced through the garden, leading him deeper into the forest. The air was filled with the sweet scent of blooming flowers, and the trees whispered with secrets. The firefly's light led Luca to a clearing where a magnificent oak tree stood, its branches reaching towards the sky like outstretched arms.

As Luca approached the tree, he saw that it was not just any oak tree, but a magical tree that held the power to grant wishes. The firefly flitted around the tree, its light casting a soft, warm glow. Luca closed his eyes and made a wish with all his heart.

The next morning, Luca awoke to find his wish had come true. The village was alive with joy and laughter, and the fields were brimming with abundant harvests. The people of the village gathered around Luca, thanking him for his pure heart and his selfless wish.

From that day on, Luca's village prospered, and the memory of the magical firefly and the wish-granting oak tree lived on in the hearts of all who lived there.

And so, dear child, remember that magic is all around us, waiting to be discovered by those with open hearts and curious minds. Close your eyes, make a wish, and never stop believing in the power of kindness and wonder.

Sleep tight, my little one. Buonanotte.
